text: Loricera pilicornis is a species of ground beetle native to Europe.Fauna EuropaeaCarl H. Lindroth 1974 Coleoptera. Carabidae. Handbooks for the Identification of British Insects Vol 4 Part 2. Royal Entomological Society,London pdf It is found in shady places near water. ==References== Category:Loricera Category:Beetles described in 1775 Category:Beetles of Europe
title: Loricera pilicornis
